Shillelagh

length [len]: 1
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 5N to forge (N1)

A Shillelagh is made from a piece of an old oak that is inhabited by faeries. To create the Shillelagh the mage enters a pact with the faeries, forcing them to protect the wielder. The faeries will bring luck and always have someone nearby to protect from unforeseen enemies.
